title: Interpretation of seeing garbage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing garbage in a dream. Garbage or garbage is leftover food and the remains of other things as a result of human use. Seeing garbage in a dream has many interpretations. It can indicate money and wealth for the poor, and they can. It indicates the recovery of the patient or indicates a lack of debts and many problems and fears, and we will explain that in this article in detail, the interpretation of seeing garbage in a dream for a single woman, a man, a young man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, as well as a divorced woman and a widow, by presenting the interpretations of visions and dreams by the great imams, so follow us on the Vision website What is the interpretation of seeing garbage in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a sick person standing in the middle of garbage indicates almost recovery. To see garbage and garbage indicates the world. Seeing garbage in a poor man’s dream indicates wealth and wealth. A single woman’s vision of garbage is evidence that his marriage is coming. Seeing yourself throwing garbage in the street means that you will get out of trouble. What is the interpretation of seeing garbage at home in a dream? Seeing garbage in the home indicates poor financial and health conditions. Seeing disposal of garbage and throwing it outside the home indicates the rejection of worries and improvement of financial conditions, as well as the recovery of the patient. Seeing garbage In front of the house, it expresses the fortuneteller’s negative thoughts, hatred, malice, and envy. If a man sees a garbage bag in his hand, this indicates that money is forbidden. What is the interpretation of a dream about a trash bin? Seeing a garbage bin emitting a foul odor indicates many problems and troubles that the dreamer faces. If it sees For a married woman, if her husband throws garbage on the ground and does not throw it in the garbage, this indicates a bad relationship between them and many disputes. To see yourself sitting in the middle of the garbage indicates many marital or family problems and disputes. What is the interpretation of garbage bags in a dream? Dreaming of collecting garbage in bags indicates the preoccupation of the world and its desires and shortcomings in worship. Seeing the house clean of garbage means renewal in the dreamer’s life and changing his life for the better... Seeing the president or ruler reading between bags of garbage means isolation from the rule or exclusion. Seeing a trash can means Obtaining an inheritance. What is the interpretation of a dream about wasting food? Seeing someone throwing garbage at you indicates misfortunes, fears, and bad news. If a pregnant woman sees that her newborn is throwing garbage and debris at her, this means that she will be exposed to many dangers and problems. If a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband He throws bags of garbage and junk, as this indicates that there are many problems between them and that he is facing many difficulties. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black garbage bag? Seeing a black garbage bag indicates the fears and crises facing the dreamer. Seeing that a garbage bag thrown in the street means that you will get money. What Interpretation of seeing garbage in a dream for a single woman? Seeing piles of garbage bags in a dream for a single woman indicates many fears and problems. If an unmarried woman sees that she is carrying garbage bags and putting them in the basket, this indicates that she has overcome difficulties and passed

title: I dreamed that my husband would marry me

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband was marrying me. Through the vision website roy2a.com, many women fear that their husbands will marry another woman and cause a lot of trouble and confusion because of the completion of this idea in their heads. Seeing a husband marrying another woman in a dream has many interpretations and proofs that we will explain to you today through this The article explains the most important things that great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen came up with, so we followed. I dreamed that my husband was marrying me. I dreamed that my husband was married to another woman. Interpreters refer this vision to a state of constant thinking and fear that reaches the level of obsession, which makes the woman She dreams of this dream. As for seeing a man marrying another woman, the woman cried loudly in the dream. It is a praiseworthy vision that shows the goodness that comes to him and endless food. The dream of a husband marrying another woman in a dream indicates that a married woman is suffering from pressures and responsibilities in life that lead to distance between her and her husband. It appears Seeing a husband getting married again: There is an emotional separation between the spouses that can lead to a third person entering their relationship. Seeing the husband’s wedding again and the dreamer is sad and depressed in a dream is a sign of bad conditions and daily affairs between them, leading to pressures and problems that affect their relationship as a couple. Read an explanation Another:Interpretation of seeing a hair clip in a dream. I dreamed that I was crazy and that he was marrying me to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin returns to seeing his husband marrying another woman in a dream. In different interpretations. Seeing a husband marrying another woman is very beautiful. Soon her husband will receive great support, whether from his profession or from his work. Seeing a party The husband’s wedding again indicates that the dreamer was pregnant. During this dream, it is a praiseworthy vision that indicates that goodness, blessing and livelihood will come into their lives. Seeing the husband’s marriage again in a dream with a Jewish or Christian woman is an indication that the dreamer will fall into many misdeeds and commit sins. He must repent and return to God. Read another explanation: I dreamed that my hand was burned. I dreamed that my husband was marrying me alone, and I know her. Seeing a husband marrying one of his wife’s close friends in a dream is an indication of the strength of the bond between his wife and her friend. Seeing a husband marrying another woman in a dream indicates that she is pregnant. She will give birth to a girl. Seeing a husband marrying a woman who has problems in a married woman’s dream indicates an improvement in the situation between the two women in the near future. Seeing a husband marrying a Jewish or Christian woman while he is a Muslim in a married woman’s dream indicates that her husband is in sin and has committed sins. I dreamed that my husband married me while I was pregnant. A vision of marriage. Marrying another woman in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of the health of her fetus and that she will give birth to a healthy child that satisfies her and her husband. Seeing that the husband is marrying another woman in a dream means that they will have an upcoming happy event, such as a promotion or a new job. Also, seeing a pregnant woman means that her husband will marry again in a dream is a sign On the strong relationship between them and the emotional stability and compatibility between them. Read another explanation: I dreamed that I had a boy and I saw

title: Interpretation of seeing prickly pear in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansThe interpretation of seeing prickly pear in a dream and seeing prickly pear in a dream symbolizes the coming of goodness and abundance, and the blessing comes from work and lawful income when you see in a dream a new job.Interpretation of a dream about gooseberries for a married womanYou know? See prickly pearIn a dream, a married woman hears news It portends happiness and contentment in her life. If a prickly pear has skin and thorns in a dream, this indicates living in stability with a partner. Prickly pear in a married woman’s dream indicates that blessings will come to her home and life. Prickly pear with skin in a dream indicates good health and well-being. Eating prickly pears in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness in the family, and God knows best. You saw in a dream a prickly pear with a lot of ripe fruits, and this is evidence that he will obtain a lot of goodness, food, and blessings, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing prickly pears in a dream for a single woman. She dreamed of a prickly pear tree in My dream refers to the happy and beautiful things that happen in his life. You dreamed of eating prickly pears in your dream, this indicates having a relationship in a short period of time, and then marrying a good and good man who will make her happy. The dream of a single girl. The prickly pears in her dream indicate her bad psychological state, Then you will go through a period of distress and sadness and you will soon rest, praise be to God. FeatherThe prickly pear in my dream indicates the fulfillment of the desires and goals that you seek to achieve in life. Interpretation of consuming prickly pears for divorced women. Seeing a divorced woman in her dream buys prickly pears, and this indicates the arrival of goodness in her life. After that, buying pears The prickly pear in her dream indicates that she will overcome many difficulties and fears in her life for a while. It symbolizes in the dream of the divorced woman when she buys it, there is great comfort from God and happiness in her life after suffering. The prickly pear generally in a separate dream indicates the abundant goodness that she will receive, Then halal food and living a life without worry or sadness. I dreamed of a special one. Eating prickly pears in my dream is a sign of getting rid of worries, sadness and problems that put me in a very bad psychological state. To see a ripe red prickly pear in a dream is one of the good and praiseworthy dreams in a dream for the dreamer because it indicates On legitimate income, abundance of money, and blessings, and God knows best. A merchant dreams of red figs in his dream, and this is evidence of the expansion of his livelihood, his lawful income, and the happiness of his family. But if the dreamer sees red figs at a different time, this indicates hatred and malice from those around him. For this reason, a red fig dream means enjoying good health. And recovery from illness. I dreamed of a prickly pear in a dream while I was a trader, and this vision indicates a profit of money and a large profit from work or investment, then a large profit for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing prickly pears in a dream: I dreamed that in your dream I was peeling prickly pears, which symbolizes an attempt Getting rid of worries and problems in the dreamer’s life. I saw the skin of a fig in my dream. The prickly pear is considered its tool

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about someone you love talking to you in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone who likes to talk to you, and it is one of the favorite visions of some dreamers, and when sleepers wake up after seeing this dream, they feel happy and comfortable because they see people dear to their hearts. It is one of the beautiful dreams that has many connotations and meanings, and the dreamer will encounter it, and in this topic we will explain all of this in detail from every aspect. Follow this article with us. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love talking to you: If the dreamer sees that he is talking to someone he loves in a dream, and when he wakes up, he forgets everything. Said, it means that the same person will fall into a crisis and you need to help him and stand by his side. The interpretation of dreaming about someone you like talking to you strangely in a dream indicates his inability to think properly during an important period when he needs to focus and take care of his work. Seeing the dreamer talking to a girl He loves her and exchanges romantic words in a dream, as this indicates the date of his imminent marriage. Whoever sees in his dream that he is talking to a person dear to his heart, and this person is one of his friends, then this symbolizes that they are opening a new business together. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love talking to you, according to Ibn Sirin. Many talk Many scholars and dream interpreters have talked about this dream, including the well-known and respected scholar Ibn Sirin, who has many clues on this topic. To learn some interpretations, follow the points below with us: Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of someone you love talking to you as an indication of the visionary’s ability to achieve all the goals and things he seeks, and he will feel satisfied and happy when he reaches his dreams. If the dreamer sees a conversation with someone he loves in a dream, and In fact, he suffers from worries and sorrows in his life, so this vision is one of the good visions for him, because it indicates that God Almighty will alleviate distress and pain. His complicated affairs. Seeing the dreamer talking to his ex-girlfriend in a very loud voice in a dream may be a sign of his desire to take revenge on her for the mistakes she committed against him and his inability to forget the memories that happened between them. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love talking to you about being single. If an unmarried girl sees That she is talking to her lover and suggesting to her his love in a dream, this indicates her constant and constant thinking about him in reality. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love talking to you with an engaged bachelor and this man was her fiancé who said beautiful words to her in a dream. Seeing a girl talking to her fiancé and breaking her ring in a dream It indicates that the separation between them occurred without convincing justification. Seeing the unmarried dreamer talking with her lover and asking him for help in her dream, this symbolizes that she is facing a major crisis and needs to stand by his side during this time. Whoever sees in her dream that she is talking to someone she loves, This may be a sign that she will meet a suitable young man and enter into an emotional relationship with him. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love looking at you for someone. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love looking at you for an unmarried woman, and this man was her lover in the dream, and this indicates his desire to continue this relationship and his desire to marry her. If the unmarried dreamer sees her lover looking at her

title: Seeing gasoline in a dream is for great interpreters

preview.html: Gasoline in a dream: Gasoline or fuel is used to drive various vehicles, and seeing it in a dream makes a person wonder about the different meanings of this dream. Does it bring him goodness and happiness in his life or anything else? Does the interpretation differ between the dreamer being male or female? Does it have the same meaning if the dreamer sprinkles it in a dream, pours it, drinks it, or fills it? All of these questions and many more will be answered in detail in the following lines of the article. Gasoline in a dream In the interpretation of a dream about gasoline, its scholars mentioned several connotations, the most prominent of which are the following: If a girl sees gasoline in her dream and smells it, this is a sign of revealing her secrets and feeling shame and remorse, so she should It is necessary to be careful and stay away from mistakes, forbidden things, and sins, and to follow the path of God. - Glory be to Him - until He pleases Him and submerges Him in this world and the hereafter. If a married woman sees that she is filling her car with gas, this is a sign that she will fulfill her dreams and achieve her goals in life, which will make her feel happy and psychologically comfortable. If an unmarried girl dreams of gasoline, this indicates great benefit Which she will return to in the coming period and the sustenance, blessing and peace of mind that God gives her. Where they can obtain a house, a car, a prominent position in society, and other valuable things. Seeing the same person buying gasoline in a dream symbolizes that he is going through a crisis that he cannot tell anyone about, but he can reveal it to one of his close friends to benefit from his advice or advice. Dream Interpretation Secrets includes The expert has teamed up with a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, type a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Gasoline in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - mentioned that seeing gasoline in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are: Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking gasoline, this is a sign of his or any individual’s death. From his family members. If a person sees that fuel catches fire during his sleep, it leads to bad luck and failure to achieve his goals, apart from facing many problems and obstacles in his life. If a fire catches from gasoline in a dream, this is a sign that he has committed many sins and disobedience. And his preoccupation with the developments and pleasures of this world. If a person dreams that he himself lights fuel in a dream, this symbolizes that he will harm many people around him and spread discord among them. Gasoline in a dream for a single woman. Seeing fuel in a girl’s dream indicates the good news that awaits her in the coming days. , such as her engagement to a good young man who will bring her comfort and happiness. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is lighting gasoline, this is a sign of her great sadness, distress, and distress. If an unmarried woman sees that she is pouring gasoline on a fire to increase its combustion, then this is a difficult psychological situation and disorders that she suffers from. You can overcome it or get rid of it. When a girl dreams of fuel that has a bright shine, this is a sign that the Lord - the Almighty - will remove her

title: I dreamed that I was flying without wings, interpretation of the dream of flying in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was flying without wings. The dream of flying comes to many people and many wonder about its correct interpretation. Many dreams were considered simple fantasies seen by the sleeper in his sleep as a result of the intense pressures that many people face, so the brain releases these pressures in their form. Of dreams, and perhaps they were true visions from God Almighty, who transmits a spirit of calm and reassurance to the souls of His servants, and in this article we explain the correct interpretation of the dream. I dreamed of flying without wings. Interpretation of dreams that I was flying without wings for one woman. An unmarried girl has many dreams that may be foretelling. With her marriage or a warning of a wrong relationship that she needs to get rid of, and through this context we explain the interpretation of a dream about a bird without wings. For a single woman: The dream of flying without wings is part of the humanity that carries the dreams of a single girl. The indication of this dream is that the girl has the will and determination to continue achieving the goals that she seeks to achieve. It also indicates that the life of the unmarried girl will change for the better in the near future. Some interpretations indicated Indicates that the girl will obtain a source of material livelihood in the near future. If the girl sees that she is flying without wings while moving from one house to another, this is a good sign that her wedding is approaching. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a tank in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for a married woman. A dream about flying without wings for a married woman symbolizes many meanings and associations at the level of her husband and children. Among the most prominent of these interpretations that summarize a married woman’s dream of flying without wings: Flying in a dream promises a married woman the comfort she will get and the solution of all her problems in the near future. It also indicates that the married woman is social and has many relationships with strangers. Transforming the married woman’s life from the current situation. To a much better condition. And seeing this dream that he is flying without wings, the woman should approach her husband, flirt with him and bridge the distance between them so that there is harmony and harmony between them. This dream also showed the strength of the close relationships between them, through which they overcame all their problems. See also: I dreamed that I was swimming in a pool. Interpretation of a dream about bathing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman as a result of the pressures she is exposed to as a result of pregnancy and her suffering during this period will see many dreams that have their meanings: Flying without wings in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the birth will be normal and good. A pregnant woman gives birth to her child with ease, and the happiness she obtains from having her child. It also indicates the good that she will obtain and the material gains in addition to the morale that she will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman flying without wings means that she will achieve dreams, status and ranks. The position that he will gain in the near future, and he will regain his position. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cookies distributed in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cookies distributed in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says in his dream: Seeing that distributing cookies indicates good deeds and good deeds, and God knows best. Also, seeing cookies distributed in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will join a new job, in addition to the end of fears. And the conflicts that occur. Also, seeing the distribution of cookies in a dream may indicate orphans, good deeds, and faith in God Almighty, and God knows best. Interpretation of distributing cookies in a dream to single women. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream and seeing the purchase and distribution of cookies indicates the collapse of worries and the emergence of many means of life. And happiness, and God knows best. Also, seeing cookies distributed to unmarried women in a dream may indicate a girl’s marriage to a good man who has a high and prestigious status and a very long relationship. Also, dreaming of buying and distributing cookies may indicate great success and distinction in academic life. And the process and the emergence of good deeds. Seeing distributing cookies in a dream to a single girl may indicate that she is joining a new and good job, as well as the arrival of joy and pleasure. Interpretation of a dream of distributing cookies to a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is distributing cookies in her dream, this indicates The end of her worries and the abundance of her future happiness, and God knows best. Also, seeing the purchase of cookies and distributing them in a dream may indicate the arrival of happiness, abundant food, good deeds, and righteous deeds. Also, seeing the distribution of cookies in a dream for a married woman may indicate the achievement of her future aspirations and goals, In addition to making her life easier. Interpretation of a dream about distributing cookies to a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream. Seeing cookies in a dream and distributing them means the end of worries and disputes and the ease of the woman’s life in her life. Also, seeing cookies distributed in a dream may indicate the ease of her upcoming birth, In addition to the approaching date of her birth and an abundance of happiness. Interpretation of a dream about distributing cookies to a man: Seeing a sweet person distributing cookies in his dream means removing the dreamer’s upcoming worries and abundant happiness, and God knows best. Also, seeing distributing cookies to men in a dream may indicate his close marriage to a girl. A righteous woman who believes in God Almighty. Also, seeing many cookies in a dream can mean doing good deeds and repenting for sins and immoral actions. Seeing distributing cookies in a married man’s dream may indicate a breakdown of differences occurring in married life, as well as an abundance of happiness. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing a military uniform in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a military uniform in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Officers of the military organization wear special uniforms, and the military uniform varies from one weapon to another. Today, through this article, we will present to you the interpretation of seeing a military uniform in a dream according to great translators, such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and others. Dream interpretation scholars, according to the status of the dreamer, whether he is a single or married man or woman, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing a military uniform in a dreamSeeing a military uniform in a dreamIt indicates that the dreamer has a respectable personality and has many good qualities. Military uniform in a dreamIt indicates that the fortuneteller He will have a great status and a prominent position in society. Seeing a military uniform in a dream also indicates that the dreamer always extends a helping hand to those who need help and makes those around him feel happy and cheerful. See also: Interpretation of seeing the army by Ibn Sirin. Interpreting seeing military uniform in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman. A married woman wearing a military uniform in a dream indicates that her conditions and circumstances will improve for the better in the coming period. A military uniform in a dream for a single woman shows that she is a girl who lives a conservative and disciplined life and does everything appropriately. Seeing a single, handsome young man wearing a military uniform in a dream shows that she will soon marry a person of high status. The yellow military uniform in a dream shows that she will face some obstacles and difficulties in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a soldier in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a military uniform in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees her husband wearing a military uniform in a dream. It indicates that promising things will happen in her husband’s professional life. The children of a married woman. Wearing a military uniform in a dream announces that her children will achieve great successes and distinction in their academic and professional lives. A military uniform in a dream is for a married woman and says that her husband has been promoted to an important position in his job and will reach a high position in his career. Interpretation of seeing a military uniform in a dream for a pregnant womanSeeing a pregnant woman in uniform Military uniform in a dream shows that she will go through a smooth and easy birth process and will not feel pain or fatigue. Military uniform in a dream for a pregnant woman. It indicates that God will bless her with a lot of goodness and sustenance in her life. Interpretation of seeing a military uniform in a dream for a man. Seeing a man wearing military clothing in a dream indicates that he He lives a life full of stability and satisfaction in all directions. Decorations and decorations in a dream for a man, which indicate that he will be assigned to another job that is better than his current job, and God knows best. A white military uniform in a dream for single women indicates that she will get married soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a military rank in a dream. Seeing a military rank in a dream, which indicates It indicates that the fortune teller will achieve great profits and gains in the coming period through his work. Seeing an officer and talking to him in a dream indicates the end of all the worries and problems that the dreamer is going through in his life. Military personnel in a dream indicates that the fortune teller is a bad person and does not wish good for those around him, and God knows best. Look

title: What is the interpretation of washing in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of bathing in a dream Many people wonder about the implications of the dream of bathing, and the desire to know its meaning, and whether it carries a message to pay attention to, but it often reflects good meanings to the viewer related to his life and circumstances, and according to the details of the dream you can determine the interpretation accurately and here in this article everything related to the interpretation of swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of bathing in a dream The interpretation of the bather in a dream carries many connotations that depend on the dreamer's social status, his real circumstances and certain details of what he sees in the dream. Bathing generally symbolizes purity, purification and new beginnings and expresses the purity that distinguishes the dreamer in his life and dealings and shows that the dreamer is in good health and constantly strives to be at his best and achieves success clearly and distinguishes him for those around him even if he complains of pain or illness, bathing and feeling comfortable in a dream are indications of the beginning of recovery. Interpretation of bathing in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that bathing in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness knocking on the door and nourishing the person who changes his life for the better after a long search and the intention to try and not give up. While bathing in front of people in the street and not wearing clothes indicates bad morals and conduct for those around him and many problems that stand in the way of what he wants. While bathing in front of a stranger in a dream indicates that the dreamer's secrets will be revealed and his cover will be revealed by someone close to his private space and he will trust him and in front of people in a public place there are unpleasant visions that indicate committing sins and bad deeds and not repenting for them, and on the other hand it indicates the fall of anxiety and the liberation of the person from the psychological problems and obsessions that control him to start a new stage of his life with psychological preparation and preparation. Bathing in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Regarding the interpretation of bathing in a dream, Al-Osaimi explains that it is one of the signs of the desire to start over and correct past mistakes and hasty decisions, and bathing with soap symbolizes purification and repentance from any sins previously committed, and bathing in a dream with clothes without the ability to take them off indicates many accumulated fears. People are one of the unpleasant visions that express the invasion of privacy and the disclosure of the secret. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, visit the “Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams” website on Google, which includes thousands of interpretations by senior interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the bathroom in a dream for a single woman If a single woman dreams that she is taking a bath at home and wearing a new dress, this is one of the commendable dreams that expresses her feeling of satisfaction and happiness and the new steps she is taking to change her personal and professional life. For the better, and perhaps he is about to get married, and if he makes a mistake in the dream, it portends the beginning of repentance and moving away from it. The dream is a sign that she feels confused and distracted in the face of the major crises facing her life. Interpretation of a dream about bathing in a public bathroom for unmarried women Bathing alone in a public bathroom

title: Interpretation of roses in a dream. The meaning of colored roses in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Roses in a dream for singles A gift of red pink roses for a married woman From a bouquet of roses Pregnant Interpretation of a dream about roses Seeing roses in a dream indicates an honorable man close to you or the arrival of someone absent from travel. If you pick a rose in your dream, it means love. Whoever dreams of picking a yellow rose means kissing a sick woman, and as for many roses, it means kisses. The green rose symbolizes a friend, and it is said that if you see a green rose in your dream, you will see a friend you miss and have not seen for a long time. Roses in a dream symbolize special memories, especially childhood memories or weddings. The black rose in a dream indicates depression, sadness, disappointment, and sometimes death, and sometimes indicates that you are suffering from constant anxiety about a certain issue. Blue flowers in a dream symbolize calm. Red roses indicate feelings and usually symbolize love and romance, but they also represent anger or jealousy. Pink roses usually show that someone is flirting with you from a distance and loves you, but does not reveal his admiration for you. Yellow roses symbolize joy, happiness, and happiness. White roses are a sign of purity, love, and marriage. The withered rose in your dream symbolizes your sad self, so you should try to revive it. The interpretation of red roses in a dream is the dominance of leadership and subjugation for men, and for women, red roses in a dream are good news and obedience to the husband For her. As for the dream of white roses, this dream is usually positive because it shows marriage if the girl sees it, and if the young man sees it, success is his ally, and white roses show pride and chivalry and sometimes show victory. Purple roses in a dream indicate the work of the devil, and whoever sees purple roses in his house, it means that he eats forbidden money and commits sin and disobedience. If a person sees jasmine in a dream, the meaning of the dream is good and indicates wealth and livelihood, but some said in this dream that it is about strife, discord and division. Jasmine in a dream indicates the righteous or the righteous son and brother, and its interpretation is desirable, and whoever sees pepper in a dream sees good things. Roses in a dream mean the death of a woman, or lost trade, or joy that will leave, but whoever was single and saw a wreath of roses on his head, he will marry. Using rose oil in a dream indicates intelligence and closeness to people, as it shows joy and pleasure, but if the rose bush is cut, it is a sign of anxiety and sadness. Red roses in a dream indicate beauty and decoration, and white roses for money Interpretation of roses in a dream - YouTube
